name: Bitdealer ✔️
description: Enter Bitdealer, the first asset-backed meme launchpad. Unlike traditional meme tokens that lack substance, each token launched on Bitdealer is underpinned by real iGaming Game that generate continuous revenue. This revenue is systematically used to buy back and burn that specific token, ensuring deflationary supply dynamics, sustained demand, and long-term value beyond short-lived hype.
